10000000.name: rank_mail
10000000.chinesesimplifiedcontent: 亲爱的用户：\n恭喜你！你登上了{{rankid}}，荣获第{{ranksort}}名！以下是登榜奖励，请查收~
10000000.englishcontent: Dear Angler：\n Congratulations! You’ve made it onto the {{rankid}}, claiming the {{ranksort}}th place！Here are your ranking rewards,claim now!

10000001.name: fish_expired_mail
10000001.chinesesimplifiedcontent: 亲爱的用户：\n您的渔获已经存放太久，为了让它们能继续活蹦乱跳，所以我们把它们送回家了，这是购买它们的费用，请查收！
10000001.englishcontent:
Dear Angler：\n 
Your fish friends have overstayed their welcome! 
To let them swim free again in their natural habitat, we've initiated an eco-recovery process for your stored catch. Please find your Sustainable Recovery Compensation below – may your next adventure bring fresher waves!

10000002.name: activity_mail
10000002.chinesesimplifiedcontent:
亲爱的用户：
{{activityid}}已结束，以下是您尚未领取的奖励，请查收~
10000002.englishcontent:
Dear users:
The period of the Road to {{activityid}}  has ended. The following are the rewards you have not yet received. Please check~
